dr.evomodel.tree
Class TreeMetricStatistic

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.Statistic.Abstract
      dr.evomodel.tree.TreeMetricStatistic
All Implemented Interfaces:
TreeStatistic, Loggable, Statistic, Attribute<double[]>, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class TreeMetricStatistic
extends Statistic.Abstract
implements TreeStatistic

A statistic that returns the distance between two trees.

Currently supports the following metrics, 1. compare - returns a 0 for identity of topology, 1 otherwise. 2. Billera tree distance. 3. ROBINSONS FOULD 4. Clade height 5. Branch Score

Version:
$Id: TreeMetricStatistic.java,v 1.14 2005/07/11 14:06:25 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Alexei Drummond, Andrew Rambaut, Joseph Heled, Sebastian Hoehna
